text: The Cimarron Mercantile, at 709 S. Collison St. in Cimarron, New Mexico, was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2019. It is listed as a filming location by the New Mexico Film Office. ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Colfax County, New Mexico Category:Buildings and structures in New Mexico
title: Cimarron Mercantile
